pull.title: doc: add more info to dependencies.md
pull.body:
Follow-up to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23565

I added more info to dependencies.md - especially links to `depends/packages/*.mk` files and link to PRs where used versions were bumped.

Preview at: https://github.com/prusnak/bitcoin/blob/dependencies/doc/dependencies.md

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22644](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22644) (Deprecate UPnP support, require 2.1 or later by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Concept ACK with the one zeromq nit that you can choose to address or not as it's a matter of opinion

verification.payload:
tree d78c96c1753abc808d1b9753cd01a355af27f19c
parent 333a41882c5ccd5f0c7f884f97d25449bdeec07b
author Pavol Rusnak <pavol@rusnak.io> 1649853357 +0200
committer Pavol Rusnak <pavol@rusnak.io> 1650460910 +0200

 doc: add more info to dependencies.md

events.message: doc: add more info to dependencies.md

events.body: ACK abcb8769bf1d8ed227e6abddd7250a613e91277d - I didn't click on or test all of the links, but this looks ok.

comments.body:
nit: while you're changing this file...the zeromq release link is actually https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/releases
this was changed by #23565. in my opinion, https://zeromq.org is less useful.

comments.body:
```suggestion
| glibc | [link](https://www.gnu.org/software/libc/) | N/A | [2.18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23511) | Yes |
```

You've dropped `N/A` from `Version Used` in the glibc column, which has broken the table.

![Screen Shot 2022-04-20 at 2 17 08 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/164239050-bb520aaf-5bca-4a86-bbac-0ccd3b5945e8.png)
